RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $6,000 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 2 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sinc e May 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, For Each $625 To $5,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMA DAREDEVIL stalked the leaders from the back of a compact field while racing two out from the rail, launched her bid two wide entering the final turn, and closed determinedly three out from the rail to get up in the final strides to prevail. DON'TPASSTHEPEPPER away well and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from the inside of JERSEY LILLIE in the run down the backstretch and into the final turn, held a narrow advantage into the lane, and just failed to last. THE KAT'S BACK stalked the leaders into the backstretch while racing just out from the rail, rallied smartly from along the inside entering the final turn while awaiting room, shifted three wide for the drive, and was gaining late to garner a share. JERSEY LILLIE broke sharply and dueled for the lead two wide from between rivals entering the backstretch, continued to press the pacesetter one out from the rail entering the final turn, and finished four wide in the drive while being outfinished in the late stages. ANIMA away alertly and pressed the pace three wide entering the backstretch, chased the leaders two out from the rail in the run to the final turn, but began to weaken entering the turn, and had little to offer late.

ENTRY.NAME: Don'tpassthepepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide, nipped

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Lillie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dueled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, outfinished late

ENTRY.NAME: The Kat's Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, rallied rail, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Anima
ENTRY.OWNER: Bulldog Bros Racing and LeMasurier Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed 3 wide, weakened 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Daredevil
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 4 wide, up in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. (PLUS UP TO $7,000 THRIF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, For Each $1,750 To $12,500 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: B C CHRISTIE away alertly and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from the inside of C C SUNRISE in the run down the backstretch, took control entering the lane, and was all out to fend off a late surge by CHI CHI'S SONG to prevail. CHI CHI'S SONG was devoid of early speed and trailed the filed into the backstretch, launched her bid three out from the rail entering the final turn, and closed willingly three wide in the drive to just miss. PETERSON LANDING tracked the leaders into the backstretch while saving ground along the inside, rallied three wide entering the final turn, was unable to match strides with the winner entering the lane, but finished willingly two wide in the drive to grab a share. C C SUNRISE broke sharply and dueled for the lead from the outside of B C CHRISTIE entering the backstretch, forced the issue two wide in the run to the final turn, continued to battle with her pace rival into the turn, but began to fade midway through the turn, and had little to offer late.

ENTRY.NAME: Chi Chi's Song
ENTRY.OWNER: Forster Stable and Blue Willow Dairy Ltd
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied 4 wide, closed 3 wide, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: B C Christie
ENTRY.OWNER: Danard Don B and Danard Sue
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied rail, rallied inside, led, held

ENTRY.NAME: C C Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dueled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Peterson Landing
ENTRY.OWNER: Tod Mountain Thoroughbreds and Redekop James
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, rallied 3 wide, closed 2 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 3 3 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000, For Each $2,500 To $45,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $62,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PISCO away well and chased the leader into the turn while racing one out from the rail, and found his best stride in deep stretch while racing two out from the rail to prove best. DONNA WYN away alertly while bobbling soon after the start, but sprinted to a clear lead in the run to the turn, maintained her advantage into the lane, bounced off the rail at the sixteenth pole and was quickly overhauled by PIsco, but regained her momentum in time to hold the place. AUGUST RAIN chased the leader into the turn while saving ground at the rail, and finished with late interest two wide in the drive to garner a share in a solid debut. HORATIO broke sharply and chased the leaders into the turn while racing one out from the rail, lacked the early speed to contend early, but finished with some late interest four wide in the drive. ONEMOMENTPLEASE ducked in at the start, but recovered to chase the leaders into the turn from along the rail, and finished three wide in the drive. LIZZIE'S RAYNE was off awkwardly and raced a bit erratically in the opening strides, chased the pace three wide into the turn, but failed to make a late impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Onemomentplease
ENTRY.OWNER: Goss Maureen Canmor Farms and Trombley Adrian
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in start, chased rail, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: August Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased rail, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lizzie's Rayne
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, chased 3 wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Donna Wyn
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, hit rail 1/16, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Horatio
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, chased 2 wide, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Pisco
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, chased 2 wide, closed 3 wide, pulled clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $5,500 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 1 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RACING RIVER away well and dueled for the lead two wide from between rivals in the run down the backstretch, continued two battle two wide entering the final turn, and prevailed in the closing strides while finishing three wide. QUAGMIRE away alertly and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace from along the rail in the run down the backside and into the final turn, held a narrow advantage into the stretch and just failed to last. RING OF KERRY settled off the contested early pace while saving ground at the rail, launched his bid from along the inside entering the final turn, and closed willingly from along the rail in the drive to get up for a share. PAINT ME LUCKY broke sharply and tracked the leaders through the first turn while racing one out from the rail, rolled up to force the issue three wide in the run down the backstretch and into the final turn, was unable to keep tabs on his pace rivals midway through the turn, and faded in the late going. TIZ MEOW trailed the field into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied two wide entering the final turn, but failed to make a late impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Quagmire
ENTRY.OWNER: Henson Lorie Klimes Helen and Pring Sharon
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide, nipped

ENTRY.NAME: Racing River
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, dueled 2w, rallied 2w, closed 3w, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Paint Me Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Ring of Kerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled rail, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Meow
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, lacked response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Chris Loseth H. HASTINGS RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 89. Stakes Purse 50000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. By subscription of $100 to accompany the nomination by Midnight Saturday, June 24, 2023 with an additional $750 to enter and $1,000 to start. $50,000 guaranteed, of which 55% goes to the winner, 20% to second, 10% to third,5% to fourt h and 4% to fifth, and 2% sixth through eighth, finishers nineth through twelfth will receive their starter fee back. High Weights preferred. Lifetime earnings as recorded by Equibase will be used in determining preference of horses assigned equal weight s. Starters to be named through the entry box by closing time of entries. Field limited to 12 starters.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEGACY SQUARE broke sharply and tracked the leaders from just off the rail through the stretch the first time, maintained a tracking trip one out from the rail entering the backside, forced the issue two wide from between rivals in the run to the final turn, rallied smartly from along the rail entering the final turn, held a narrow advantage into the lane, and held off a late bid by ACCIDENTAL HERO to prevail. ACCIDENTAL HERO tracked the leaders through the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, raced in a stalking trip in the run down the backstretch, rallied one out from the rail entering the final turn, and closed determinedly three wide in deep stretch while gaining late to prove clearly second best. LUCKY FORCE away alertly and dueled for the lead two wide entering the stretch the first time, held a narrow advantage in the run down the backside while racing two out from the rail, battled from the outside of LEGACY SQUARE entering the final turn, was unable to keep tabs on that rival leaving the turn, and gave way grudgingly late while proving clearly best of the rest. TAPITS CHOICE away well and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the stretch the first time, eased into a tracking trip from along the rail entering the backside, rallied from along the inside entering the final turn, but needed more late as no match for the top three. TIME TICKER pressed the pace three wide through the stretch the first time, was unable to keep tabs on the leaders in the run down the backside, and lacked a closing response when called upon. ARISTOCRACY stalked the leaders through the stretch the first time while racing three out from the rail, trailed the field in the run down the backstretch, and failed to mount a late bid when called upon.

ENTRY.NAME: Legacy Square
ENTRY.OWNER: Tod Mountain Thoroughbreds and Redekop James
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked inside, rallied rail, led, held

ENTRY.NAME: Tapits Choice
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnson, Gary C., Pumpkin Stable and Sharlea Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied rail, tracked rail, rallied inside, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Accidental Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dueled 2 w, led 3 w, rallied 2w, closed 3 w

ENTRY.NAME: Aristocracy
ENTRY.OWNER: Christoff, Gordon and Trails End Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, trailed, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Time Ticker
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3 wide, dropped back, lacked response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Supernaturel H. HASTINGS RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 80. Stakes Purse 50000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. By subscription of $100 to accompany the nomination by Midnight Saturday, June 24, 2023 with an additional $750 to enter and $1,000 to start. $50,000 guaranteed of which 55% goes to the winner, 20% to second, 10% to third, 5% t o fourth and 4% to fifth, and 2% sixth through eighth, finishers nineth through twelfth will receive their starter fee back. High Weights preferred. Lifetime earnings as recorded by Equibase will be used in determining preference of horses assigned equalw eights. Starters to be named through the entry box by closing time of entries. Field limited to 12 starters.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AIR FORCE away alertly and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the stretch the first time, controlled the pace in the run down the backstretch and into the final turn, opened a clear lead through the turn and was never seriously threatened late while being ridden out in the stretch drive. KEY TO SUCCESS away well and stalked the leader through the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, maintained her position in the run down the backstretch, rallied two wide entering the final turn, and closed one out from the rail in the drive to hold the place. FORCE TO REKN WITH broke sharply and settled off the early pace while saving ground at the rail through the stretch the first time, rallied smartly from along the inside entering the final turn, and closed determinedly from along the rail in the drive to just miss the place. MATSQUI settled off the early pace while racing one out from the rail through the stretch the first time, rallied from along the inside entering the final turn, and finished one out from the rail in the drive. LOVEABOVEANDBEYOND tracked the leader from along the inside in the run through the stretch the first time, forced the issue from the outside of AIR FORCE in the run down the backstretch, rallied two wide into the final turn, was unable to keep tabs on the pacesetter entering the final turn, and faded over the final furlong. NEIGHNEIGH stalked the leader through the stretch the first time while racing two out from the rail, maintained her position in the run down the backside, raced two wide into the final turn, but faded over the final furlong. ELLAMEISTER settled off the early pace while racing three wide through the stretch the first time, trailed the field in the run down the backside, and was unable to mount a late bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Matsqui
ENTRY.OWNER: Renfrew Racing B and B Racing No Trump Stable Elder Matt and Breen Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied rail, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Key to Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, stalked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Ellameister
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3 wide, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Neighneigh
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, rallied 2 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Loveaboveandbeyond
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Force to Rekn With
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, settled rail, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Air Force
ENTRY.OWNER: Dale Dennis Peter Morris and Welsh Ed
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, clear lead, ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, For Each $1,250 To $10,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PURSUE settled off the contested early pace while racing one out from the rail entering the backstretch, launched his bid three wide entering the final turn, shifted four wide leaving the turn, assumed command in mid stretch and quickly puled clear as much the best. TIZ VICIOUS broke sharply and tracked the dueling leaders into the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, launched his bid three wide entering the final turn, assumed command soon after entering the lane, but was no match when tackled by PURSUE in mid stretch while proving clearly second best. I'M CORFU away well and dueled for the lead from the outside of FINDING WAYS entering the backstretch, continued a pace battle from between rivals through the final turn, was overtaken entering the lane, and finished two wide in the drive to hold the place. FINDING WAYS away alertly and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the backstretch, set a pressured pace from the inside of I'M CORFU in the run down the backside and through the final turn, was overtaken entering the lane, and was outfinished in the drive. JOCK TALK unhurried early while dropping back to trail in the early stages, dropped down to the rail approaching the first turn, and briefly lost his action, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, and closed with late interest from along the rail in deep stretch. ASKMENOQUESTIONS settled off the early pace while saving ground at the rail in the run down the backstretch, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, but faded in the late going.

ENTRY.NAME: Finding Ways
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied rail, rallied inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Pursue
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 4 wide, best

ENTRY.NAME: Jock Talk
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Askmenoquestions
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled rail, rallied inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Corfu
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, dueled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Vicious
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, led, 2nd best
